item.title:
This male toad is emitting a mating call.
Sound and ripples are a specific message to attract females during the breeding season and to warn other rival males of their presence. And possibly to keep away.
[📹: Lauren Hoover] https://t.co/UKLt2YarAM

item.title:
Argyroxiphium is a small genus of plants in the sunflower family, Asteraceae. They consist of rosette-forming epigeal shrubs and a rosette will grow from 5–20 years before flowering, after which it dies
